ComicInfo.Summary: Using the Scatter Ray to kill the inhabitants of Beautville (though leaving the town intact) has an unforeseen side effect. A rift is opened into an alternate dimension where there is another Beautville. General Piggott uses the opportunity to try his new Strangle Bombs, but things don't end well.
